body_html:
@alextp thanks! ResourceVariable was what I also looked at. Our use-case is:
we are building a fitting library in High Energy Physics based on TF. We would really appreciate your opinion on the variables. As it's use-case specific, I'd propose to move it here (and leave it as a reference).

body:
@alextp thanks! ResourceVariable was what I also looked at. Our use-case is:
we are building a fitting library in High Energy Physics based on TF. We would really appreciate your opinion on the variables. As it's use-case specific, I'd propose to move it [here](https://github.com/zfit/zfit/issues/28) (and leave it as a reference).
